TextView.android:text: INFANT MORBIDITY (B5)
Birth Internal ID
Member ID
Household ID
Child Sl
Record the following information from PNC card or prescription or from mothers recall (If PNC card/prescription available)/n*Enter 99 in all parts if date is unknown **Record provider code
Did baby/[name] have diarrhea (3 or more loose stools per day) in the past two weeks? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for baby/[name]s diarrhea? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for baby/[name]s diarrhea? PROBE TO IDENTIFY THE LAST SOURCE (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Other, specify
Did baby/[name] have an illness with a cough in the past two weeks? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Did baby have fast, short, rapid breaths or difficulty breathing in the past two weeks? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Was the fast or difficult breathing due to a problem in the chest or to a blocked or runny nose?
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for babys illness?
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for baby/[name]â€™s illness PROBE TO IDENTIFY THE LAST SOURCE (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Other, specify
Did baby/[name] have a fever (was the babe unusually hot to touch) in the past two weeks? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for baby/[name]s fever?
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for baby/[name]s fever? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Other, specify
Has baby/[name] lost weight over the last three months?
Has baby/[name] had poor/slow weight gain over the last three months?
Has baby/[name] been eating/feeding less in the past two weeks?
Is baby/[name] underweight or thin for their age?
Is baby/[name] overweight or large for their age?
*DO NOT ASK RESPONDENT* FOR A MULTIPLE PREGNANCY, HAS THE RESPONDENT COMPLETED THE MODULE FOR EACH BABY?
